Package fr.sorbonne_u.components.connectors

Class AbstractConnector

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.sorbonne_u.components.connectors.AbstractConnector
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ConnectorI, ComponentInterface, RequiredCI
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AbstractDataConnector, AbstractTwoWayConnector, CommunicationConnector, DynamicComponentCreationConnector, IntercessionConnector, IntrospectionConnector, NodeConnector, ReflectionConnector, RoutingConnector
    public abstract class AbstractConnector
extends Object
implements ConnectorI
    The class AbstractConnector partially implements an abstract connector between two components by assuming that the offering component implements the offered interface.

    Description

    Invariant

     invariant      true

    Created on : 2011-11-02

    Author:
    Jacques Malenfant
